name: Poor Monster
description:
Poor Monster

A monster ridiculed for his lacking Halloween costume will not be laughed at again this year, they will stop at nothing to become the best monster he can be! but first he needs some money...

Poor Monster was made in around 24 hours by myself for a private game jam hosted by some of my friends. It's biggest inspirations are StickmanRPG and Undertale.

It is by no means finished and some bugs are present but I see this more of a proof of concept and can see this really growing into a fun role playing game with a heavy focus on story telling and player decision.

I hope you enjoy and please do not hesitate to leave feedback!

Things to be added
  • A shop of costumes that come with different perks
  • A win/lose condition when Halloween comes
  • An upgrade potions system
  • NPC quests
  • Mini-games as jobs
  • Energy bar
